Title: Relates to criminal trespass in the third degree
Summary: Adds to the definition of trespassing in the third degree, not having entered a lease or license for such building or real property with the rightful owner, enters or remains in such building or upon such real property or otherwise occupies such building or real property without title, right, permission of the rightful owner, or payment of rent accepted by the rightful owner.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the penal law, in relation to criminal trespass in the third degree
